description: This table contains summary information for billing system account notepad notes attached to accounts.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Account Notepad note record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account record to which the note is attached. This ID may be encrypted if you have implemented enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption security function.

columns.name: ACTIVE_STATUS
columns.description:
The status of the note: active or inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who manually created the note. If the note was automatically created by billing system, this is the person who executed the activity that triggered the note creation. This ID may be encrypted

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The invoice number associated with this note.

columns.name: NOTE_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the account note was created.
